text: Use `/lunch` to tell your team members that you're at lunch break. Some examples:
• `/lunch`: Start or end your lunch break (default: %s minutes, your setting: %s minute%s)
• `/lunch 30`: Start your lunch break for 30 minutes
• `/lunch default 30`: Set your default lunch break time to 30 minutes
• `/lunch default unset`: Unset your default lunch break time
